questions.context: You are a member of the Student Council.
questions.question: Your school principal has asked you to write a report assessing the current school facilities and suggesting improvements.
keyPoints: Describe the current condition of the facilities
Explain what problems students face
Recommend specific improvements

questions.context: You recently participated in a two-week student exchange programme in Spain.
questions.question: Write a report for your school about the exchange programme, describing what you learned and whether the school should continue it.
keyPoints: Describe the accommodation and school activities
Explain what you learned from the experience
Recommend whether the school should continue the programme

questions.context: Your local council wants feedback on sports facilities.
questions.question: Write a report assessing the local sports centre and suggesting improvements.
keyPoints: Describe existing facilities and equipment
Explain what improvements are needed
Recommend specific changes for young users

questions.context: Your class recently went on an educational trip.
questions.question: Write a report about the trip for your teacher.
keyPoints: Describe accommodation and activities
Explain what students enjoyed and any problems
Recommend improvements for future trips

questions.context: The school library is being reviewed.
questions.question: Write a report assessing library services and suggesting improvements.
keyPoints: Describe current services and opening hours
Explain what is useful and what problems exist
Recommend changes to improve the library

questions.context: You recently completed a work experience placement.
questions.question: Write a report about your experience for the school.
keyPoints: Describe the company and your tasks
Explain what skills you developed
Recommend whether to continue this placement

questions.context: The school wants to improve cafeteria services.
questions.question: Write a report assessing the cafeteria and suggesting improvements.
keyPoints: Describe current food options and service
Explain main complaints from students
Recommend specific improvements

questions.context: Your school participated in an environmental project.
questions.question: Write a report evaluating the project.
keyPoints: Describe project activities and participation
Explain achievements and difficulties
Recommend whether to organize similar projects

questions.context: The local council is reviewing youth club facilities.
questions.question: Write a report assessing the youth club.
keyPoints: Describe current activities and facilities
Explain what works well and what needs improvement
Recommend specific changes

questions.context: You completed a summer language course.
questions.question: Write a report about the course for the organizers.
keyPoints: Describe teaching methods and materials
Explain what was effective and any problems
Recommend improvements
